name: PAT_ENC_MSP_EGHP2
description: This table contains the Secondary Employer Group Health Plan Info part of the Medicare Secondary Payor Information from the Patient (EPT) master file. Some questionnaires use this as the spouse's EGHP info rather than the 'secondary' EGHP info.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date (calendar format) on which the encounter took place.

columns.name: OTHER_EGHP_YN
columns.description: YES if the patient is covered by another employer group health plan (EGHP) in addition to the one listed under Primary EGHP.

columns.name: EGHP_EMPLOYEE_NAME
columns.description: Name of the person whose employer group health plan (EGHP) covers the patient.

columns.name: OTHR_EGHP_REL_C_NAME
columns.description: The coverage subscriber's relationship to the patient.

columns.name: OTHR_EGHP_PCP
columns.description: Name of the patient's Primary Care Provider.

columns.name: OTH_EGHP_EMPL_NAME
columns.description: The employer that sponsors the employer group health plan (EGHP).

columns.name: OTH_EGHP_EMPL_PHON
columns.description: The employer's phone number.

columns.name: OTH_EGHP_EMPL_AD_1
columns.description: Secondary employer group health plan (EGHP) address line 1.

columns.name: OTH_EGHP_EMPL_AD_2
columns.description: Secondary employer group health plan (EGHP) address line 2.

columns.name: OTH_EGHP_EMPL_CITY
columns.description: Secondary employer group health plan (EGHP) subscriber's employer city.

columns.name: OTH_EGHP_EMPL_ZIP
columns.description: Secondary employer group health plan (EGHP) subscriber's employer zip

columns.name: OTH_EGHP_INSR_COMP
columns.description: Name of the secondary employer group health plan (EGHP).

columns.name: OTH_CVG_HMO_YN
columns.description: YES if coverage is an HMO.

columns.name: OTH_EGHP_POLCY_NUM
columns.description: Patient's member number for the secondary employer group health plan (EGHP).

columns.name: OTH_EGHP_GROUP_NUM
columns.description: Group number of the secondary employer group health plan (EGHP).

columns.name: OTH_EGHP_INSR_AD_1
columns.description: Secondary employer group health plan (EGHP) address line 1.

columns.name: OTH_EGHP_INSR_AD_2
columns.description: Secondary employer group health plan (EGHP) address line 2.

columns.name: OTH_EGHP_INSR_CITY
columns.description: Secondary employer group health plan (EGHP) city.

columns.name: OTH_EGHP_INSR_ZIP
columns.description: Secondary employer group health plan (EGHP) Zip.

columns.name: OTH_EGHP_20_EMP_YN
columns.description: Does the employer that sponsors this group health plan have 20 or more employees?

columns.name: OTH_EGHP_100_EMP_YN
columns.description: Does the employer that sponsors this group health plan have 100 or more employees?

columns.name: OTH_EGHP_BEN_PKG
columns.description: The benefit package number or policy ID number for the employer group health plan.

columns.name: OTH_EGHP_CUR_EMP_YN
columns.description: Yes if the employer group health plan is through the subscriber's current employment.
